name: Lopp
description:
Lopp is a relaxing and sometimes stressful game.
In this game you can not only play a single game, but also compete with your friends.
In a single game you have to collect balls to achieve more and more results, and in multiplayer to dodge lines. Who can dodge longer will win.

Single player
  • Relaxing and at times dynamic gameplay.
  • Pleasant soundtrack.
  • Scoreboards.

Multiplayer
  • Tense gameplay.
  • Dynamic soundtrack.
  • Scoreboards.
  • The ability to interfere with the enemy.
